testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"..............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then Page Title should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration"..........passed When User click on Log out link.............................................passed Then Page Title should be "Your store. Login"...............................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
